name: Monkey Olympics
description:
Game about olympics and apes, what more were you expecting?

How to play:

Balloon Popper:

-w,s keys to control player; mouse for aim and click to fire

-pop the most amount of balloons with your limited darts, avoid grey balloons

Jungle Rush:

-a,d to control player; Space to jump

-collect as many bananas without falling or leaving the screen

-Banana Picker:

-a,d to control player

-collect as many falling bananas in your basket as possible in one minute, be careful, do not take the poop
